help-hidden.name: Help Hidden
help-hidden.description: Show hidden options (intended for VerCors experts, proceed with caution!)

help-passes.name: Help Passes
help-passes.description: Lists the pass keys available for options that take a pass key.

quiet.name: Quiet Mode
quiet.description: Instruct VerCors to only log errors.

verify.name: Verification Mode
verify.description: Instruct VerCors to verify the given files (default)

more.name: More Errors
more.description: Always print the maximum amount of information about errors.

lang.name: Language
lang.description: {silver|pvl|llvm|i|java|c|systemc} Do not detect the language from the file extension, but force a specific language parser for all files

backend-file-base.name: Backend File Base
backend-file-base.description: In addition to verification, output the resulting ASTs for the backend to files, appended with -<number>.<extension>

backend-debug.name: Debug Mode
backend-debug.description: Instruct the backend to print as much debugging information as possible

output-after-pass.name: Output After Pass
output-after-pass.description: <pass>=<path> Print the AST after a pass key

output-before-pass.name: Output Before Pass
output-before-pass.description: <pass>=<path> Print the AST before a pass key

skip-backend.name: Skip Backend
skip-backend.description: Stop VerCors successfully before the backend is used to verify the program

skip-translation.name: Skip Translation
skip-translation.description: Stop VerCors successfully immediately after the file is parsed and resolved, and do no further processing

skip-translation-after.name: Skip Translation
skip-translation-after.description: <pass> Stop VerCors successfully after executing the transformation pass with the supplied key

skip-pass.name: Skip Pass
skip-pass.description: <pass> Skip the passes that have the supplied keys

silicon-print-quantifier-stats.name: Print Quantifier Stats
silicon-print-quantifier-stats.description:
<amount> Print quantifier instantiation statistics from Z3 via silicon, every <amount> instantiations, every 5 seconds. 
Implies --dev-silicon-num-verifiers 1

silicon-quiet.name: Silicon Quiet Mode
silicon-quiet.description: Disable various diagnostics of the silicon backend.

bip-report-file.name: JavaBIP report
bip-report-file.description: <path> Write JavaBIP verification report to file, or standard out if "-" is used

c-define.name: -D Options
c-define.description: <macro>=<defn>,... Pass -D options to the C preprocessor

paths-simplify.name: Simplify paths
paths-simplify.description: <simplify.pvl>,... Specify a chain of files to use that contain axiomatic simplification rules

paths-simplify-after-relations.name: Simplify Path after relations
paths-simplify-after-relations.description: <simplify.pvl>,... Specify a chain of files to use the contain axiomatic simplification rules, which will be applied after quantified integer relations are simplified

path-adt.name: ADT Path
path-adt.description: <path> Use a custom directory that contains definitions for all internal types encoded as axiomatic datatypes (array, option, any, etc.)

path-cc.name: C compiler path
path-cc.description: <path> Set the C compiler to use for preprocessing

path-c-system.name: System Headers path
path-c-system.description: <path> Set the include path for system headers (-isystem)

no-std-class-path.name: No STD class path
no-std-class-path.description: Remove the @jre (the default path to specified classes in the java runtime) and @source (the sources root computed via the package entry of submitted sources) entry

class-path.name: Class path
class-path.description: <path>|@jre|@source Add an entry to the sources class path

path-z3.name: Z3 path
path-z3.description: <path> Set the location of the z3 binary

path-boogie.name: Bookie path
path-boogie.description: <path> Set the location of the boogie binary

path-c-preprocessor.name: C Preprocessor path
path-c-preprocessor.description: <path> Set the location of the C preprocessor binary

veymont.name: Veymont Mode
veymont.description: Enable VeyMont mode: decompose the global program from the input files into several local programs that can be executed in parallel

test.name: Test Mode
test.description: Enable batch testing mode: execute all tests in a directory

test-dir.name: Testing Directory
test-dir.description: <path> The directory from which to run all tests

test-workers.name: Workers #
test-workers.description: <value> Number of threads to start to run tests (default: 1)

test-failing-first.name: Failing First
test-failing-first.description: When run twice with this option, VerCors will run the tests that failed the previous time first (cancelling a run is safe)

test-generate-failing-run-configs.name: Generate failing run config
test-generate-failing-run-configs.description: Generates Intellij IDEA run configurations for tests that fail (and deletes recovered tests, cancelling a run is safe)

test-ci-output.name: CI Output
test-ci-output.description: Tailor the logging output for a CI run
